description.displayText: we hired Yvonne to take care of my father in law. we were very transparent that it would be for only a couple hours a few times a week and we would gradually transition to a full time position but during the trial period she canceled on us twice last minute. care itself was OK but not dependable or reliable.
description.originalText: we hired Yvonne to take care of my father in law. we were very transparent that it would be for only a couple hours a few times a week and we would gradually transition to a full time position but during the trial period she canceled on us twice last minute. care itself was OK but not dependable or reliable.

description.displayText: I have worked hand in hand with Yvonne. She has always made her patients feel a sense of comfort, safety, and reliability. She goes over and beyond to give the best care she possibly can. She is licensed through the board of nursing and has plenty experience from working through agencies. Not only does she give a sense of assurance to her patients, but also makes sure the family is fully aware of all that goes on with their loved ones!
description.originalText: I have worked hand in hand with Yvonne. She has always made her patients feel a sense of comfort, safety, and reliability. She goes over and beyond to give the best care she possibly can. She is licensed through the board of nursing and has plenty experience from working through agencies. Not only does she give a sense of assurance to her patients, but also makes sure the family is fully aware of all that goes on with their loved ones!

description.displayText: Yvonne has been taking care of our 93 year old mom for the last year and a half. Mom is unable to walk, has a feeding tube and COPD. Yvonne has been a blessing, an angel sent from heaven! She is not only knowledgeable, responsible, and loving, but constantly amazes us by going above and beyond. Yvonne takes great pride in providing mom with top notch care. She really loves what she does and it shows. Yvonne has done mom's hair many times and would not accept any extra money. She says it is important to her that her patients feel special and also look their best. Yvonne is great at trouble shooting and has worked extra for us whenever needed. I can go on and on, bottom line....we love Yvonne!

description.displayText: She is a very thoughtful person and very professional with her job. Her loving and caring ways is what makes her a favorite for anyone who hires her. She is a responsible mother of 5 sons, no situation is too stressful or big for her
